title: FNB Crosses Above Key Moving Average Level - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Wednesday, shares of FNB Corp (Symbol: FNB) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $11.37, changing hands as high as $11.46 per share. FNB Corp shares are currently trading up about 2.2% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of FNB shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, FNB's low point in its 52 week range is $9.35 per share, with $13.44 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $11.46.
